meaning: relax, cheap, low, quiet, rested, contented, peaceful

onyomiExamples.meaning: low-priced, cheap, inexpensive, shallow (e.g. sympathy), superficial, cheap (e.g. government)
easy, simple, easygoing, lighthearted, simplistic, irresponsible, careless, quick (to do)

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to be rested, to feel at ease, to repose, to be relieved
cheap, rash, thoughtless, careless, indiscreet, frivolous
criterion, standard, yardstick, reference, aim, rough estimate, approximation

kunyomiExamples.example: 安らかにお眠りください
kunyomiExamples.reading: やすらかにおねむりください
kunyomiExamples.meaning: rest in peace, requiescat in pace, RIP
